howToConvert.title: How to convert a PDF to Word file
howToConvert.description: We made our file converter to be as easy to use as possible. Converting your PDF to a Word document involves three steps:

steps.description: Upload your PDF: Click upload to choose a file from your computer, or drag your file into the dropzone above.
Click 'Convert to Word': This converts your file from Word to PDF.
Download your document: Your download will start automatically, or you can click to download your file.

whyConvert.title: Why convert PDF to Word files
paragraphs: You may need a free PDF to Word download to make changes to a document in one simple step. PDFs typically preserve their original formatting, meaning making changes to the document would require multiple downloads, checking, and editing.

This PDF converter will quickly change your PDF to a Word file, allowing for easier accessibility for others to collaborate and edit the document. Once you download your Word file, you can easily manipulate text, images, and the structure of the content to prepare it for the final draft.
